Description: <font color="#c08585">Rally</font>: Recover lost HP by attacking
+{VALUE}% Damage for Roars and Breath Attacks
+{VALUE}% Damage on Charged Spells and Skills
+{VALUE}% HP restoration from Flask of Crimson Tears
+{VALUE}% FP restoration from Flask of Cerulean Tears
Slowly restores HP while in combat
<font color="#ada184">Daredevil</font>: +10% Damage/+25 Phys Atk on deflect for self and enemy
<font color="#f9e6b9">Last Stand</font>: Explode in an AoE heal/buff when taking critical damage once
<font color="#ada184">Infighter</font>: Attacking with Claws or Fists bestows an infinitely stacking buff to Poise/Stamina Regen/Damage/Poise Damage for 7 seconds
<font color="#f48c25">Pyromaniac</font>: When wielding a Torch all Fire Attack Power +20% & attacking imparts -5% Fire Resist/+5% Fire Attack stacking infinitely
<font color="#8fbdbe">Fortress</font>: When wielding any shield receive Max HP/Poise/Aggro. Effect increases at Heavy Equip Load.
<font color="#ff7979">Giantslayer</font>: Attacks with a Crossbow or Ballista deal bonus damage based on the opponent's Max HP (+3% enemy Max HP of damage over 2s)
<font color="#eac678">Belmont</font>: When wielding a Whip receive +25% Holy Attack Power/+25% Damage to Undead & enemies cannot dodge throwing weapons
<font color="#f48c25">Pyromancer</font>: HP Down/Fire Dmg Up/Lifesteal on Fire Attacks
